scripts.openapi: cd .. && mix openapi.spec.json --spec GameServerWeb.ApiSpec --filename clients/javascript/openapi.json --pretty=true && cd clients
scripts.generate: mkdir -p javascript && cd javascript && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.json -g javascript -o . --additional-properties usePromises=true,projectName=@ughuuu/game_server,projectVersion=1.0.0 && npm i && npm run build && cd ..
